trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento consente di personalizzare (o proprietario) l'aspetto di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo nella visualizzazione dettagli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento viene generato da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllare quando il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su `true` e la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Il DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs passato al gestore dell'evento contiene informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>per disegnare e fornisce inoltre metodi che consentono di disegnare l'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A>per recuperare informazioni relative all'elemento padre dell'elemento secondario da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>stesso, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>proprietà per recuperare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>che rappresenta l'intestazione della colonna in cui viene visualizzato l'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>proprietà per eseguire il disegno effettivo all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per disegnare standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>gli elementi che non richiedono la personalizzazione, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>proprietà quando si desidera che il sistema operativo per disegnare l'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile quando si desidera personalizzare solo determinati elementi secondari.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per evitare problemi di sfarfallio delle immagini durante il disegno personalizzato, eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo e impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Questa funzionalità è disponibile solo in Windows XP e in Windows Server 2003 quando l'applicazione chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni e posizione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso specificato da questa proprietà è rispetto all'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> colonna in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>viene visualizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>colonna all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> insieme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: Disegna lo sfondo del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>utilizzandone il colore di sfondo corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per creare uno sfondo standard che utilizza il valore corrente del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Lo sfondo viene disegnato per riempire l'area specificata dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>proprietà dell'elemento padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve essere impostato su `false` per impedire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore dell'elemento padre di ignorare il valore dell'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>deve essere disegnato dal sistema operativo anziché disegnato dal proprietario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event for subitems that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento per gli elementi secondari che non si desidera personalizzare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta questa proprietà su `true`, verrà creato l'elemento secondario in genere utilizzando i valori correnti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà > [!NOTE] > il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>proprietà dell'elemento padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve essere impostato su `false` per impedire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore dell'elemento padre di ignorare il valore dell'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento secondario deve essere disegnata dal sistema operativo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> if the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un rettangolo di attivazione per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>Se l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> ha lo stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare un rettangolo di attivazione standard per l'elemento secondario.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di attivazione viene disegnato un pixel all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il `bounds` parametro.

trans-unit.source: It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Viene disegnata solo quando l'elemento padre è attivo, pertanto non è necessario controllare lo stato attivo dell'elemento prima di chiamare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile disegnare il rettangolo di attivazione solo attorno al primo elemento secondario (vale a dire l'elemento padre, che viene visualizzato nella prima colonna) invece che attorno a ogni elemento secondario di un elemento.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the normal behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al normale comportamento di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllare quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the DrawFocusRectangle method only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Per disegnare il rettangolo di attivazione intorno al primo elemento secondario, chiamare il metodo DrawFocusRectangle solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>valore è 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo non fornisce la possibilità di selezionare i singoli elementi secondari, ma se si desidera implementare manualmente la selezione, è possibile utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare il rettangolo di attivazione intorno a un elemento secondario diverso dal primo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: L'area in cui disegnare il rettangolo di attivazione.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il testo del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>utilizzandone il colore di primo piano corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare il testo dell'elemento secondario utilizzando i valori correnti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene disegnato all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>proprietà dell'elemento padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve essere impostato su `false` per impedire la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i valori dell'elemento padre di ignorare i valori dell'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il testo del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>utilizzando il colore di primo piano corrente e di formattazione con la proprietà specificata <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valori.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare il testo dell'elemento secondario utilizzando i valori correnti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene disegnato all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>valori specificati nel `flags` parametro consentono di fornire proprietà di formattazione per l'etichetta del nodo, ad esempio l'allineamento del testo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>proprietà dell'elemento padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>deve essere impostato su `false` per impedire la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i valori dell'elemento padre di ignorare i valori dell'elemento secondario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizzato per disegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornisce proprietà e metodi utili per il disegno sul dispositivo di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizzato per disegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the header of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'intestazione del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> colonna in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>viene visualizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> for the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> per la colonna in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>viene visualizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per accedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>padre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Questo è utile quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>proprietà non fornisce le informazioni appropriate per soddisfare le esigenze.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>proprietà fornisce solo informazioni di stato di base che è possibile utilizzare, ad esempio, per determinare se l'elemento padre selezionato, selezionata o con stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento, d'altra parte, consente di accedere a tutti i membri dell'elemento padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per l'accesso di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da creare, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> che rappresenta il padre di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice dell'elemento padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice dell'elemento padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato corrente dell'elemento padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per controllare se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>padre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da creare è in un determinato stato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the parent item.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà fornisce solo informazioni di base sullo stato dell'elemento padre.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà, ad esempio, per determinare se l'elemento padre selezionato, selezionata o con stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Se si desiderano maggiori informazioni, recuperare l'elemento padre tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>proprietà e archivia le relative proprietà direttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valori che indicano lo stato corrente dell'elemento padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs> properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è utile quando l'altro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>proprietà non forniscono le informazioni appropriate per soddisfare le esigenze.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The SubItem property allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento secondario consente di accedere a tutti i membri del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È necessario accedere a questo oggetto direttamente, ad esempio, per disegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore manualmente piuttosto che utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>
